item.description:
After a long holiday weekend you need some time to unwind right? Well Sevenender a local band to Cromwell, CT will be doing a reunion show at Rookies Bar & Grill in Cromwell, CT. Doors open at 7pm. There is no cover and it is always a great time.

Christmas day night is usually a busy time at Rookies and always a big reunion. We will have the opportunity to eat, drink and dance at our leisure.

I know a lot of you will be away for the holidays but thought it would be a good opportunity for those of us who are around.

Please feel free to call my cell at 860-614-9367 or reach me via email at chrsie@hotmail.com.

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: Christmas night to unwind!
